dillon.gameAPI.sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • dillon.gameAPI.sprites.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class should be used to make sprites to use similar to entities.
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(java.awt.image.BufferedImage Img)
      You should use the sprite manager instead of executing this from the game.
